user.about: Hi! I am simply a person who makes Pokemon Showdown themes, and customs. PM me, Typhl0s1on, on room Wi-Fi if you want a custom theme or have a problem with one of my themes. I will not communicate here. :) (Original creator of Five Nights at Freddy's Theme) Vote for a new FNAF theme in honor of the first Showdown FNAF theme reaching just about 100 downloads!~ http://strawpoll.me/3406379
